title: Interview Episode 2 - Odd Arne Westad FBA
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: Arne Westad, ST Lee Professor of US-Asia Relations at Harvard University, joins Jeff to discuss his new book The Cold War: A World History and weighing in on important questions surrounding the cold war.  Join us for a discussion with one of the pre-eminent scholars of the Cold War and a great influence for the founding of this show.
itunes:subtitle: Arne Westad, ST Lee Professor of US-Asia Relationâ€¦
description: Arne Westad, ST Lee Professor of US-Asia Relations at Harvard University, joins Jeff to discuss his new book The Cold War: A World History and weighing in on important questions surrounding the cold war.  Join us for a discussion with one of the pre-eminent scholars of the Cold War and a great influence for the founding of this show.
